articles.title: French Open 2022 -- Rafael Nadal has 'zero problem' with playing Felix Auger-Aliassime -- who is coached by his Uncle Toni - ESPN
articles.description: On Sunday, Rafael Nadal will face Felix Auger-Aliassime for the first time since his uncle, Toni Nadal, began coaching the Canadian player.
articles.content:
For Rafael Nadal, family is everything.
So when Nadal faces Felix Auger-Aliassime in the fourth round at Roland Garros on Sunday, he won't worry if his uncle, Toni Nadal, is sitting in the stands in… [+1863 chars]
